means: （高尔夫球棍）向下的一挥，下降趋势

sentence.Network_en: The manufacturing economy remains on a downswing.
the current downswing in the airline industry
sentence.Network_cn: 航空业目前的滑坡状况

sentence.Network_en: Your body must not sway to the left during the downswing.
sentence.Network_cn: 下降时你的身体决不能向左摇晃.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 保龄球英文_爱问知识人 ... 扬球 follow through 下摆 downswing 后摆 backswing.
会计词汇E ... downside trend 跌势 downswing 下降趋势；衰退时期 downturn 市况逆转；市况回落.
英语行业 / 专业词汇_英文阅读网 ... downsun 背阳的 downswing 向下之一挥 downthrow 陷落.
...(TopoftheSwing):平稳地走向完美6.下杆(Downswing):获得准确的距离7.击球(Impact):精确的瞬间8.顺势运动(Follow-Through):成功的.

list.abs: since the downswing of the inventory cycle unusually brutal , the inventory-led element of the upswing could be quite vigorous too .鉴于此前库存周期导致的产出下降异常迅猛，那么库存主导的产出上升可能也会相当强劲。
since the downswing of the inventory cycle was unusually brutal , the inventory-led element of the upswing could be quite vigorous too .因为库存的衰落会异乎寻常的残酷，以库存为主导的要素可能会蓬勃发展起来。

entry.tran: (经济等的)突然下降，下降趋势
entry.def: A downswing is a sudden downward movement in something such as an economy, that had previously been improving.

example.ex: The manufacturing economy remains on a downswing.
...inflation and the threat of an economic downswing.
example.tran: 通货膨胀和经济下滑的威胁

means.word_mean: 1. a swing downward of a golf club
2. a worsening of business or economic activity;
